product_name: Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: The women's Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shorts not only look cool, they keep you cool thanks to special fabric technology. Textured Elite Transfer In-R-Cool(R) fabric powered by coldblack(R) wicks moisture, dries fast and reflects the sun to provide superior cooling. V-front waistband flatters and adds comfort. Anatomical multipanel design fits like a glove. Women-specific Elite 3D chamois is designed for intermediate to advanced riders for racing or training. Reflective elements aid visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shorts for women provide a side pocket for small items.
short_description: The women's Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shorts not only look cool, they keep you cool thanks to special fabric technology.
